register.name: ICC_ASGI1R_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Alias Software Generated Interrupt Group 1 Register
register.description: Generates Group 1 SGIs for the Security state that is not the current Security state.

bitField.name: Aff3
bitField.description: The affinity 3 value of the affinity path of the cluster for which SGI interrupts will be generated.

bitField.name: IRM
bitField.description: Interrupt Routing Mode. Determines how the generated interrupts are distributed to PEs.

bitField.name: Aff2
bitField.description: The affinity 2 value of the affinity path of the cluster for which SGI interrupts will be generated.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the SGI.

bitField.name: Aff1
bitField.description: The affinity 1 value of the affinity path of the cluster for which SGI interrupts will be generated.

bitField.name: TargetList
bitField.description: Target List. The set of PEs for which SGI interrupts will be generated. Each bit corresponds to the PE within a cluster with an Affinity 0 value equal to the bit number.

register.name: ICC_BPR0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Binary Point Register 0
register.description: Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines Group 0 interrupt preemption.

bitField.name: BinaryPoint
bitField.description: The value of this field controls how the 8-bit interrupt priority field is split into a group priority field, that determines interrupt preemption, and a subpriority field.

register.name: ICC_BPR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Binary Point Register 1
register.description: Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines Group 1 interrupt preemption.

bitField.name: BinaryPoint
bitField.description: If the GIC is configured to use separate binary point fields for Group 0 and Group 1 interrupts, the value of this field controls how the 8-bit interrupt priority field is split into a group priority field, that determines interrupt preemption, and a subpriority field. For more information about priorities, see .

register.name: S_ICC_BPR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Binary Point Register 1
register.description: Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines Group 1 interrupt preemption.

bitField.name: BinaryPoint
bitField.description: If the GIC is configured to use separate binary point fields for Group 0 and Group 1 interrupts, the value of this field controls how the 8-bit interrupt priority field is split into a group priority field, that determines interrupt preemption, and a subpriority field. For more information about priorities, see .

register.name: N_ICC_BPR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Binary Point Register 1

bitField.name: BinaryPoint
bitField.description: If the GIC is configured to use separate binary point fields for Group 0 and Group 1 interrupts, the value of this field controls how the 8-bit interrupt priority field is split into a group priority field, that determines interrupt preemption, and a subpriority field. For more information about priorities, see .

register.name: ICC_CTLR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Control Register (EL1)
register.description: Controls aspects of the behavior of the GIC CPU interface and provides information about the features implemented.

bitField.name: A3V
bitField.description: Affinity 3 Valid. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: SEIS
bitField.description: SEI Support. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: IDbits
bitField.description: Identifier bits. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: PRIbits
bitField.description: Priority bits. Read-only and writes are ignored. The number of priority bits implemented, minus one.

bitField.name: PMHE
bitField.description: Priority Mask Hint Enable.

bitField.name: EOImode
bitField.description: EOI mode for the current Security state.

bitField.name: CBPR
bitField.description: Common Binary Point Register.

register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Control Register (EL1)

bitField.name: EOImode

bitField.name: CBPR

bitField.name: SEIS

bitField.name: EOImode

bitField.name: CBPR

register.name: ICC_CTLR_EL3
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Control Register (EL3)
register.description: Controls aspects of the behavior of the GIC CPU interface and provides information about the features implemented.

bitField.name: nDS
bitField.description: Disable Security not supported. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: A3V
bitField.description: Affinity 3 Valid. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: SEIS
bitField.description: SEI Support. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: IDbits
bitField.description: Identifier bits. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: PRIbits
bitField.description: Priority bits. Read-only and writes are ignored. The number of priority bits implemented, minus one.

bitField.name: PMHE
bitField.description: Priority Mask Hint Enable.

bitField.name: RM
bitField.description: Routing Modifier. For legacy operation of EL1 software with GICC_CTLR.FIQen set to 1, this bit indicates whether interrupts can be acknowledged or observed as the Highest Priority Pending Interrupt, or whether a special INTID value is returned.

bitField.name: EOImode_EL1NS
bitField.description: EOI mode for interrupts handled at Non-secure EL1 and EL2.

bitField.name: EOImode_EL1S
bitField.description: EOI mode for interrupts handled at Secure EL1.

bitField.name: EOImode_EL3
bitField.description: EOI mode for interrupts handled at EL3.

bitField.name: CBPR_EL1NS
bitField.description: Common Binary Point Register, EL1 Non-secure.

bitField.name: CBPR_EL1S
bitField.description: Common Binary Point Register, EL1 Secure.

register.name: ICC_DIR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Deactivate Interrupt Register
register.description: When interrupt priority drop is separated from interrupt deactivation, a write to this register deactivates the specified interrupt.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the interrupt to be deactivated.

register.name: ICC_EOIR0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller End Of Interrupt Register 0
register.description: A PE writes to this register to inform the CPU interface that it has completed the processing of the specified Group 0 interrupt.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID from the corresponding ICC_IAR0_EL1 access.

register.name: ICC_EOIR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller End Of Interrupt Register 1
register.description: A PE writes to this register to inform the CPU interface that it has completed the processing of the specified Group 1 interrupt.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID from the corresponding ICC_IAR1_EL1 access.

register.name: ICC_HPPIR0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register 0
register.description: Indicates the highest priority pending Group 0 interrupt on the CPU interface.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the highest priority pending interrupt, if that interrupt is observable at the current Security state and Exception level.

register.name: ICC_HPPIR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register 1
register.description: Indicates the highest priority pending Group 1 interrupt on the CPU interface.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the highest priority pending interrupt, if that interrupt is observable at the current Security state and Exception level.

register.name: ICC_IGRPEN0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 0 Enable register
register.description: Controls whether Group 0 interrupts are enabled or not.

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables Group 0 interrupts.

register.name: ICC_IGRPEN1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 1 Enable register
register.description: Controls whether Group 1 interrupts are enabled for the current Security state.

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables Group 1 interrupts for the current Security state.

register.name: S_ICC_IGRPEN1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 1 Enable register
register.description: Controls whether Group 1 interrupts are enabled for the current Security state.

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables Group 1 interrupts for the current Security state.

register.name: N_ICC_IGRPEN1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 1 Enable register
register.description: Controls whether Group 1 interrupts are enabled for the current Security state.

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables Group 1 interrupts for the current Security state.

register.name: ICC_IGRPEN1_EL3
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Group 1 Enable register (EL3)
register.description: Controls whether Group 1 interrupts are enabled or not.

bitField.name: EnableGrp1S
bitField.description: Enables Group 1 interrupts for the Secure state.

bitField.name: EnableGrp1NS
bitField.description: Enables Group 1 interrupts for the Non-secure state.

register.name: ICC_PMR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Interrupt Priority Mask Register
register.description: Provides an interrupt priority filter. Only interrupts with a higher priority than the value in this register are signaled to the PE...

bitField.name: Priority
bitField.description: The priority mask level for the CPU interface. If the priority of an interrupt is higher than the value indicated by this field, the interface signals the interrupt to the PE.

register.name: ICC_RPR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Running Priority Register
register.description: Indicates the Running priority of the CPU interface.

bitField.name: Priority
bitField.description: The current running priority on the CPU interface. This is the group priority of the current active interrupt.

register.name: ICC_SGI0R_EL1

bitField.name: INTID

bitField.name: Aff1

bitField.name: TargetList

register.name: ICC_SRE_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller System Register Enable register (EL1)
register.description: Controls whether the System register interface or the memory-mapped interface to the GIC CPU interface is used for EL1.

bitField.name: DIB
bitField.description: Disable IRQ bypass.

bitField.name: DFB
bitField.description: Disable FIQ bypass.

bitField.name: SRE
bitField.description: System Register Enable.

register.name: ICH_HCR_EL2
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Hyp Control Register
register.description: Controls the environment for VMs.

bitField.name: EOIcount
bitField.description: This field is incremented whenever a successful write to a virtual EOIR or DIR register would have resulted in a virtual interrupt deactivation.

bitField.name: TDIR
bitField.description: Trap Non-secure EL1 writes to ICC_DIR_EL1 and ICV_DIR_EL1.

bitField.name: TSEI
bitField.description: Trap all locally generated SEIs. This bit allows the hypervisor to intercept locally generated SEIs that would otherwise be taken at Non-secure EL1.

bitField.name: TALL1
bitField.description: Trap all Non-secure EL1 accesses to ICC_* and ICV_* System registers for Group 1 interrupts to EL2.

bitField.name: TALL0
bitField.description: Trap all Non-secure EL1 accesses to ICC_* and ICV_* System registers for Group 0 interrupts to EL2.

bitField.name: TC
bitField.description: Trap all Non-secure EL1 accesses to System registers that are common to Group 0 and Group 1 to EL2.

bitField.name: VGrp1DIE
bitField.description: VM Group 1 Disabled Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: VGrp1EIE
bitField.description: VM Group 1 Enabled Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: VGrp0DIE
bitField.description: VM Group 0 Disabled Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: VGrp0EIE
bitField.description: VM Group 0 Enabled Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: NPIE
bitField.description: No Pending Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: LRENPIE
bitField.description: List Register Entry Not Present Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: UIE
bitField.description: Underflow Interrupt Enable.

bitField.name: En
bitField.description: Enable.

register.name: ICH_LR0_EL2
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller List Registers
register.description: Provides interrupt context information for the virtual CPU interface.

bitField.name: State
bitField.description: The state of the interrupt:

bitField.name: HW
bitField.description: Indicates whether this virtual interrupt maps directly to a hardware interrupt, meaning that it corresponds to a physical interrupt. Deactivation of the virtual interrupt also causes the deactivation of the physical interrupt with the ID that the pINTID field indicates.

bitField.name: Group
bitField.description: Indicates the group for this virtual interrupt.

bitField.name: Priority
bitField.description: The priority of this interrupt.

bitField.name: pINTID
bitField.description: Physical INTID, for hardware interrupts.

bitField.name: vINTID
bitField.description: Virtual INTID of the interrupt.

bitField.description: Indicates whether this virtual interrupt maps directly to a hardware interrupt, meaning that it corresponds to a physical interrupt. Deactivation of the virtual interrupt also causes the deactivation of the physical interrupt with the ID that the pINTID field indicates.

bitField.description: Indicates the group for this virtual interrupt.

bitField.name: Priority
bitField.description: The priority of this interrupt.

bitField.name: pINTID

bitField.name: vINTID
bitField.description: Virtual INTID of the interrupt.

register.name: ICH_VMCR_EL2
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Machine Control Register
register.description: Enables the hypervisor to save and restore the virtual machine view of the GIC state.

bitField.name: VPMR
bitField.description: Virtual Priority Mask. The priority mask level for the virtual CPU interface. If the priority of a pending virtual interrupt is higher than the value indicated by this field, the interface signals the virtual interrupt to the PE.

bitField.name: VBPR0
bitField.description: Virtual Binary Point Register, Group 0. Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines Group 0 interrupt preemption, and also determines Group 1 interrupt preemption if ICH_VMCR_EL2.VCBPR == 1.

bitField.name: VBPR1
bitField.description: Virtual Binary Point Register, Group 1. Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines Group 1 interrupt preemption if ICH_VMCR_EL2.VCBPR == 0.

bitField.name: VEOIM
bitField.description: Virtual EOI mode.

bitField.name: VCBPR
bitField.description: Virtual Common Binary Point Register.

bitField.name: VFIQEn
bitField.description: Virtual FIQ enable.

bitField.name: VAckCtl
bitField.description: Virtual AckCtl.

bitField.name: VENG1
bitField.description: Virtual Group 1 interrupt enable.

bitField.name: VENG0
bitField.description: Virtual Group 0 interrupt enable.

register.name: ICH_VTR_EL2
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller VGIC Type Register
register.description: Reports supported GIC virtualisartion features.

bitField.name: PRIbits
bitField.description: Priority bits. The number of virtual priority bits implemented, minus one.

bitField.name: PREbits
bitField.description: The number of virtual preemption bits implemented, minus one.

bitField.name: IDbits
bitField.description: The number of virtual interrupt identifier bits supported:

bitField.name: SEIS
bitField.description: SEI Support.

bitField.name: A3V
bitField.description: Affinity 3 Valid.

bitField.name: nV4
bitField.description: Direct injection of virtual interrupts not supported.

bitField.name: TDS
bitField.description: Separate trapping of Non-secure EL1 writes to ICV_DIR_EL1 supported.

bitField.name: ListRegs
bitField.description: The number of implemented List registers, minus one. For example, a value of 0b01111 indicates that the maximum of 16 List registers are implemented.

register.name: ICV_AP0R0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 0 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 0 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP0R1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 0 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 0 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP0R2_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 0 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 0 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP0R3_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 0 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 0 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP1R0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 1 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 1 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP1R1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 1 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 1 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP1R2_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 1 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 1 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_AP1R3_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Active Priorities Group 1 Registers
register.description: Provides information about virtual Group 1 active priorities.

register.name: ICV_BPR0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Binary Point Register 0
register.description: Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines virtual Group 0 interrupt preemption.

bitField.name: BinaryPoint
bitField.description: The value of this field controls how the 8-bit interrupt priority field is split into a group priority field, that determines interrupt preemption, and a subpriority field.

register.name: ICV_BPR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Binary Point Register 1
register.description: Defines the point at which the priority value fields split into two parts, the group priority field and the subpriority field. The group priority field determines virtual Group 1 interrupt preemption.

bitField.name: BinaryPoint
bitField.description: If the GIC is configured to use separate binary point fields for virtual Group 0 and virtual Group 1 interrupts, the value of this field controls how the 8-bit interrupt priority field is split into a group priority field, that determines interrupt preemption, and a subpriority field.

register.name: ICV_CTLR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Control Register
register.description: Controls aspects of the behavior of the GIC virtual CPU interface and provides information about the features implemented.

bitField.name: A3V
bitField.description: Affinity 3 Valid. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: SEIS
bitField.description: SEI Support. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: IDbits
bitField.description: Identifier bits. Read-only and writes are ignored.

bitField.name: PRIbits
bitField.description: Priority bits. Read-only and writes are ignored. The number of priority bits implemented, minus one.

bitField.name: EOImode
bitField.description: Virtual EOI mode.

bitField.name: CBPR
bitField.description: Common Binary Point Register.

register.name: ICV_DIR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Deactivate Virtual Interrupt Register
register.description: When interrupt priority drop is separated from interrupt deactivation, a write to this register deactivates the specified virtual interrupt.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the virtual interrupt to be deactivated.

register.name: ICV_EOIR0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual End Of Interrupt Register 0
register.description: A PE writes to this register to inform the CPU interface that it has completed the processing of the specified virtual Group 0 interrupt.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID from the corresponding ICV_IAR0_EL1 access.

register.name: ICV_EOIR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual End Of Interrupt Register 1
register.description: A PE writes to this register to inform the CPU interface that it has completed the processing of the specified virtual Group 1 interrupt.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID from the corresponding ICV_IAR1_EL1 access.

register.name: ICV_HPPIR0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register 0
register.description: Indicates the highest priority pending virtual Group 0 interrupt on the virtual CPU interface.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the highest priority pending virtual interrupt.

register.name: ICV_HPPIR1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register 1
register.description: Indicates the highest priority pending virtual Group 1 interrupt on the virtual CPU interface.

bitField.name: INTID
bitField.description: The INTID of the highest priority pending virtual interrupt.

register.name: ICV_IGRPEN0_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Interrupt Group 0 Enable register
register.description: Controls whether virtual Group 0 interrupts are enabled or not.

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables virtual Group 0 interrupts.

register.name: ICV_IGRPEN1_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Interrupt Group 1 Enable register
register.description: Controls whether virtual Group 1 interrupts are enabled for the current Security state.

bitField.name: Enable
bitField.description: Enables virtual Group 1 interrupts.

register.name: ICV_PMR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Interrupt Priority Mask Register
register.description: Provides a virtual interrupt priority filter. Only virtual interrupts with a higher priority than the value in this register are signaled to the PE.

bitField.name: Priority
bitField.description: The priority mask level for the virtual CPU interface. If the priority of a virtual interrupt is higher than the value indicated by this field, the interface signals the virtual interrupt to the PE.

register.name: ICV_RPR_EL1
register.gui_name: Interrupt Controller Virtual Running Priority Register
register.description: Indicates the Running priority of the virtual CPU interface.

bitField.name: Priority
bitField.description: The current running priority on the virtual CPU interface. This is the group priority of the current active virtual interrupt.
